title: Daniel Reid Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Daniel Reid? Check out all of Daniel Reid's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogDaniel Reid Daniel Reid Born and raised in London, Daniel’s passion for numbers led him to a degree in mathematics and a career as a data analyst. Over time, he transitioned into an insights guru, blending technical expertise with strategic thinking to distil complex data into actionable insights. A trusted industry voice, Daniel enjoys simple pleasures outside of work—spending time in the pub, watching movies, and cheering on Arsenal FC. He’s also a devoted family man, often spending quality time with his wife and child. Show more Insights Lululemon’s Reported Slowdown: What the Data Tells Us Ecommerce News by Daniel Reid 7 Min.
